title: I don't know what skin I got for the 10 Year Anniversary Mystery Skin Box
body: So I was in Champion Select when Riot sent my the notification of my mystery skin box. I already own Kayle and Riot Kayle so I was expecting the mystery skin. I was not able to see who I got before it disappeared and the game started. I checked my purchase history to see if I could find out that way, but it didn't show anything. What can I do to find out what I got?

replies.body: The notification banner would have been for the anniversary icon.  Gifts are not finished being sent out and your account hasn't received one yet.  There may not be a toast for it, but you should be able to check your store purchase history.  Updates will be provided on the [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) until everything is wrapped up.  hang tight!

Oh okay! I got the anniversary icon and i got the notification that I got a mystery skin. But before I could check who I got, I left champion select into the loading screen. That's why I think it glitched and I wasn't able to see who I got, or get one at all! Is there a last day that Riot is going to be sending out these mystery skins because I'm excited!
